name: BlaBla
description:
A game for the ludum Dare 48

You have 20 floors to go down in an elevator, but people want to tell you about their problem, you only have 5 seconds to answer and be free, be careful 9 people maximum can stay in the elevator or it will fall

How to play : just write the text inscribed in the speech bubble within the allotted time and without fail

Thanks for playing !

Dev : Vidan Murati - https://itch.io/profile/vmurati  - https://www.instagram.com/vidanm_/

Art : Wampy - https://wampy-studio.itch.io/  -  https://www.instagram.com/frenot_frederic/

Sound : Impact - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDuWBT_2WPB1j7rIpYohAkQ
